fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Dark Times: if you are lynched, the town gains another 24 hours in the day phase, and may lynch again.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Mark a player each night, and then hunt at another players house.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be aligned with the Town or the REF at random.
- If your marked player visits the hunted players house, you will attack the marked player.
- This role cannot spawn naturally.
- This role can only appear in Balanced role lists.

fields.name: Special Mechanic:
fields.value:
Travelling
- If a player is not a spectator and wishes to join the game before night 2, they may decide to join as the Outsider. Limit of 1 per game, and travelling may be denied at the hosts discretion.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Enter the town and assist in the elimination of your opposition.
